Interface QueueInfoDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
QueueInfoDAORedisImpl
public interface QueueInfoDAO
QueueInfoDAO provides access to the queues in use by Jesque.
Author:
Greg Haines

  • Method Details

    • getQueueNames

      List<String> getQueueNames()
      Returns:
      the list of queue names

    • getPendingCount

      long getPendingCount()
      Returns:
      total number of jobs pending in all queues

    • getProcessedCount

      long getProcessedCount()
      Returns:
      total number of jobs processed

    • getQueueInfos

      List<QueueInfo> getQueueInfos()
      Returns:
      the list of queue informations

    • getQueueInfo

      QueueInfo getQueueInfo(String name, long jobOffset, long jobCount)
      Parameters:
      name - the queue name
      jobOffset - the offset into the queue
      jobCount - the number of jobs to return
      Returns:
      the queue information or null if the queue does not exist

    • removeQueue

      void removeQueue(String name)
      Delete the given queue.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the queue
